basics.name: Siddharth Gelera
basics.label: Principal Developer
basics.summary: Full Stack Developer • Minimalist • OSS Fanatic

highlights: Lead and built ComplyIQ and it's tax management platform for the American Clientele to increase tax filing accuracy
Built the impoweredTeam iOS and Android app and it's arch to help caretakers and caregivers find each other quickly
Worked with Parkpoolr from the MVP to it's acquisition while helping people book parkings every minute of the day and space hosts being able to customize the fair and availability to their liking
Worked and guided variety of other small scaled apps and startup in terms of technology/digitalization and simplification of deployments and development
Helped setup with various quality of life improvements to the LoopBack.io codebase
Managed elastic search queries and instances to make sure analytical reports were accurate and fast
Minor contributions to the NativeScript app that was built as a companion to the large web based portal
Worked on creating a simplified flow for both customer and garage owners to manage their bookings for car repairs. The stack was the good ol' MEAN Stack
Attempted on improving the damage detection of vehicles with Machine Learning aka Tensorflow and Python with the help of a few interns
Bought to life a marketing analytics platform that curates data from multiple platforms (Facebook/LinkedIn Ads, Instagram Ads, etc)
Parallely worked on 2 platforms one for Taxation and another for Medical Delivery Ops
Learned backend developement with loopback.io while working with React and Angular.js for the above mentioned platforms
Found my first set of mentors

Worked with the core team to bring to life a very MVP phase Admin portal for managing driver bookings and location to help with both automatic ride assignment and manually helping customer get drivers

highlights: Used by Air Live Reload (16k Stars) - https://github.com/air-verse/air

highlights: Got it working for iOS and Android for most of the DOM operations
